item.title: 10 Things Dad Actually Might Want for Father’s Day
item.description: From robot vacuums to skateboards to steaks, this gift guide offers all sorts of ideas for all sorts of dads.

item.title: Small Business Optimism Rises, Reversing Trend, Says NFIB
item.description: While economic conditions remain uncertain, entrepreneurs are learning to live with it.

item.title: What Big Brands Can Learn From Hailey Bieber’s $1 Billion Payday for Rhode
item.description: Fervency came naturally to this brand. If you’re a big brand watching this, pay heed.

item.title: A Study of Millions of People Uncovers the 1 Personality Trait Linked to Becoming More Intelligent (and Happier)
item.description: Want to get smarter? Research shows a simple way that won’t require a dramatic personality change.

item.title: Everyday Americans and CEOs No Longer Think the Economy Is Collapsing
item.description: Inflation expectations are cooling and business forecasts are ramping up.
